newsitem.title: USA: Dynamic Healthcare to acquire Dynacor.
newsitem.headline: Dynamic Healthcare to acquire Dynacor.

text.p: Dynamic Healthcare Technologies Inc said on Monday that it had signed a definitive agreement to buy Dynacor Inc of Apple Valley, Minnesota, in a stock transaction.

Under the terms of the agreement, Dynamic will acquire all outstanding common shares of Dynacor in exchange for 250,000 shares of Dynamic's common stock, Dynamic said in a statement. The company expects to account for the transaction as a pooling of interest.

Dynacor, a privately held company founded in 1978, concentrates on the design of laboratory information systems for hospitals, health maintenance organizations and reference labs. For the year ended June 30, 1996, Dynacor reported revenues of $3.3 million, Dynamic said.
Dynamic also said the acquisition of Dynacor increases its annualized support revenue base to more than $12.5 million.
Dynamic Healthcare Technologies Inc develops, markets and supports information systems that enable the storage and retrieval of electronic health information.
